lines.text: Relations of friendly intimacy with the United States on the one hand and their unswerving fidelity to the British commonwealth and the motherland on the other. Canada, the link which joins together these great branches of the human family.
Sit down, old fellow. Judge Brisson has decided not to shoot us.
we've accepted a commission from a victim to find her murderer. For the first time we've been retained by a corpse.
Ramson has undoubtedly established another character for himself - perhaps several others - by now familiar to the people of La Morte Rouge and quite above suspicion. He could be almost anyone...
Poor, innocent little child. I should have prevented this!

[to Holmes]
Several of our most responsible citizens have actually seen the strange apparition on the moors at night.
